text: Ashley Margaret Anne Leggat (born September 26, 1986) is a Canadian actress who is known for her roles as "Casey MacDonald" in the Canadian series Life with Derek. She is close friends with her television co-star Michael Seater. She has four older brothers. She is also a supporter of anti-bullying along with Michael Seater. Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian television actors Category:Actors from Hamilton, Ontario
title: Ashley Leggat
